description: This is not an intuitive game. I installed this for a youngster and neither of us could figure it out. If you want a soccer game and are prepared to spend more than a few minutes figuring it out, this game may be a good choice.
L'application s'installe correctement mais ne se lance pas sur Fedora 35 ( installation depuis les dépôts RPM, fonctionnait sur Fedora 34 ).
